Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.ServletStorage

Class ServletUtilities

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.ServletStorage.ServletUtilities
public final class ServletUtilities extends Object
Esta classe contém métodos auxiliares utilizados em SignerServlet

    • makeFileNameForXML

      public static String makeFileNameForXML​(String xmlUrl, String fileFormat)
      Replaces the "https://" from a given URL. Without his operation, the signature state of a URL will be said as "Indeterminate".

    • keyStoreInitializer

      Returns:
      A Key Store that has been initialized.

    • loadKeyStore

      public static void loadKeyStore​(KeyStore ks, InputStream p12InputStream, char[] password) throws IOException
      Preenche o KeyStore dado com as informações dadas
      Parameters:
      ks - KeyStore a ser preenchido
      p12InputStream - O P12 que contém os dados do assinante
      password - A senha do P12
      Throws:
      IOException - Exceção em caso de erro na leitura do P12

    • addToZip

      public static void addToZip​(ZipOutputStream zipOut, String fileName)
      Puts the next file, already signed, to be zipped inside a list of .zip files.
      Parameters:
      zipOut - The output stream responsible for zipping all the wanted-to-be- -signed files together in a single .zip file, which will be returned to the user.

    • closeZip

      public static void closeZip​(ZipOutputStream zipOut, byte[] signatureBytes) throws IOException
      As we are handling an OutputStream object, we must ensure it is closed properly after its use.
      Parameters:
      zipOut - The
      signatureBytes - A container that holds the signature inside it. We must encode it and write it to our ZipOutputStream object.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if we are not capable of close the given ZipOutputStream object.

    • prepareToClose

      public static void prepareToClose​(ZipOutputStream zipOut, String fileName, byte[] signatureBytes)
      Adiciona a nova entrada ao ZipOutputStream e fecha o objeto OutputStream
      Parameters:
      zipOut - Estrutura que mapeia o nome do arquivo ao seus bytes
      fileName - O nome do arquivo ao qual os bytes pertencem
      signatureBytes - Os bytes a serem adicionados

    • getFileName

      public static String getFileName​(jakarta.servlet.http.Part part)
      We need to get the file name, so we can return the signature to the user with the same file name plus the signature extension
      Parameters:
      part - To be signed file, uploaded using a form
      Returns:
      File name, as saved in the user computer

    • replaceFileExtension

      public static String replaceFileExtension​(String fileWithExtension)
      Remove a extensão do nome do arquivo a ser assinado
      Parameters:
      fileWithExtension - O nome do arquivo com extensão
      Returns:
      O nome do arquivo sem extensão

    • fileExtension

      public static String fileExtension​(SignerType sigPol)
      Retorna a extensão de arquivo relacionada com o tipo de assinatura
      Parameters:
      sigPol - A política da assinatura
      Returns:
      A extensão de arquivo
